import React, { useEffect, useState } from 'react' import { Link, useParams } from 'react-router-dom' import data from '../../LocalJSON/MessageData.json' import data1 from '../../LocalJSON/Users.json' import '../../CSS/Message.css' const Message = () => { const { id } = useParams() const detailData = data && data.find(something => something.id == id) console.log(detailData.name) const sender = data1 && data1.find(s => s.id == id) const recever = data1 && data1.find(s => s.id == 1) const [info1, setInfo1] = useState(""); const [fDta, setfDta] = useState(); useEffect(() => { setfDta(data) if (info1) { const filter = data.filter(n => ((n.name).toLowerCase()).includes((info1).toLowerCase())) console.log(filter) setfDta(filter) } }, [info1]) return (

<

{detailData.name}
setInfo1(e.target.value)} />
{fDta.length > 0 ? fDta.map((el) => { return (

{el.name}

{el.message[0].msg}

) }) :

Hi..{sender.pic}Not data found

}
) } export default Message
